patthana16.79:1.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ bhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nabhāvanāya
patthana16.79:1.1_1: pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
patthana16.79:2.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho
patthana16.79:2.1_1: nanabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
